nodes.text: Nothing left but fleas...
Gregor seems to want me to hunt these dratted Dire Rats. I'll hold onto this one as proof.
Dead Dire Rat - yum, yum.
Another Drat part for Gregor.

Drat parts, Drat parts, yummy, yummy Drat parts...
Drat parts, Drat parts, pick them up - run.
Oh, Drat, parting is such sorrow.
There's nothing quite like the odor of dead Drat.
Dead Drat is where it's at.
Many parts are edible. (In theory...)
You know, hunting Drats is getting to be tiresome. There's got to be a better way to make some Lyra around here.
Here's a piece that's... especially succulent. Ucch.
Who knew school life would be so glamorous?
And I thought they smelled bad on the outside.
Parts is parts.
Great, now I've got Drat guts on my knee.
I wish Gregor would find something else to eat. Like maybe some fresh fillet of Sosi... or a big, juicy Terkducken.
If my mother could only see me now. She'd be sick to her stomach, just like me.
Is this how Heroes start out, by scavenging dead Drats?
You'd think that carrying dead Drat parts around would frighten away other Drats. But no.
The sooner I get this to Gregor, the better. I don't like it stinking up my inventory.
I guess I could always find a job as an exterminator... or a butcher.
This reminds me... I'm overdue for a flea dip.
Happy entrails to you... until we meet again...
I wonder if this makes me smell like Drat, and my friends just aren't telling me.
I'm tired of trying to look dignified when I do this...
Ecch... I hope Gregor likes 'em old and stringy.
Good thing I already ate dinner, 'cuz this would kill my appetite.
Well... at least they're organic. None of those artificial Drat parts for Gregor.
This one was sick anyway. I was doing it a favor.
I wonder if Ifetaya would pay more than Gregor for... naah, probably not.
I shouldn't feel bad about this. I mean, they'd eat me if they got the chance, right?
I hope I'm dismembering this correctly.
Pan-fry this in some butter, a little squeeze of lemon, a few capers, and you've actually got a pretty tasty...
...wait, what am I saying? I've been down here too long!
I wonder if I've set some sort of record yet for this. I should mount one of their heads on my wall.
Sometimes you feel like a Drat... sometimes you don't...
Sooner or later, I'm going to pick up a parasite doing this.
I wonder why Gregor only likes the tails. I mean, they're 99% gristle.
I just have to keep telling myself this is all for a greater good: my personal enrichment.
I will never feel clean again.
